featured.text: Sasaki stated in an interview: “Because my thoughts couldn’t be 26 through a regular phone line, I wanted them to be carried on the wind.”

Sometimes referred to as secret shoppers, mystery shoppers 11 regular customers to purchase items, eat in restaurants, make inquiries, or return items.

other.text: Small amounts of regular activity, even just standing and moving around, throughout the day is enough to bring the increased levels back down.
Besides working, regular exercise is essential to keep the astronauts healthy in microgravity.
Some even run regular activities to attract visitors.
Regular exercisers, furthermore, are found to be about 30 percent less active on days when they exercise.

definition.zh_def: 定期的；有規律的；正常的
definition.en_def: Occurring at fixed intervals or in a predictable pattern; normal or usual.
definition.example: She goes for a regular jog every morning.
